messages.messageBody:
David,

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Fw: The Importance of Following a Strict School  Curr...
messages.msgSnippet: I was the original poster -- it was written by my good friend Jan Hunt of The Natural Child Project -- www.naturalchild.org -- check out her site.  She sent it
messages.messageBody:
I was the original poster -- it was written by my good friend Jan Hunt of The
Natural Child Project -- www.naturalchild.org -- check out her site. She sent
it in response to my own spoof on ADTD -- Attention Deficit Teaching Disorder.

It is satire.

David

aworthen wrote:

> I believe it was meant to be funny. Of course as we all know, it can be hard
> to tell when reading text, how one means something. :-)
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: <Jaam1224@...>

> School Curr...
>
> > Helllllooooo, is this a joke? Was she kidding?
